mapper.select: SELECT QNA_NO, QNA_TITLE, QNA_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YY.MM.DD') AS CREATE_DATE, ANSWER_FL FROM QNA WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} ORDER BY CREATE_DATE ASC
SELECT TRAVEL_NAME, CONTENT_IMG, AREA_CODE FROM "LIKE" JOIN CONTENT USING(CONTENT_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND CONTENT_DEL_FL = 'N'

SELECT REPLY_CONTENT, TRAVEL_NAME, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YY.MM.DD.') AS CREATE_DATE, REPLY_NO FROM REPLY JOIN CONTENT USING(CONTENT_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND REPLY_DEL_FL = 'N' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE ASC

SELECT MYPLAN_NAME, TO_CHAR(DEPART_DATE, 'YY.MM.DD') AS DEPART_DATE, TO_CHAR(ARRIVAL_DATE, 'YY.MM.DD') AS ARRIVAL_DATE, DEPART_PLACE, CEIL(SYSDATE - DEPART_DATE) AS DDAY, PLAN_NO FROM MYPLAN WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} ORDER BY DEPART_DATE DESC
SELECT PLAN_NO, CONTENT_NO, M.TRAVEL_NAME, C.AREA_CODE, C.CONTENT_IMG FROM MYPLAN_DETAIL M JOIN CONTENT C USING(CONTENT_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
